title: Video Generation: Text to Motion
description: A fast breakdown of Video Generation: Text to Motion for builders.

hook.text: 'A golden retriever surfing a wave at sunset.' A 4-second video clip appears.

buildup.text: Video generation extends image diffusion with temporal consistency across frames.

discovery.text: Sora, Runway Gen-3, and Kling generate coherent short clips from text descriptions.

twist.text: Temporal coherence is hard: objects morph, physics break, and people gain extra limbs.
